issue.title: [JS] File reader attempts to load the same dictionary batch more than once
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1698](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1698). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If more than one field references the same dictionary, the JS impl will try to load its dictionary batch into a vector one time for each field.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1698?focusedCommentId=16213863) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1222
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1222>
